entry.title: Welcome to my HomeLab
entry.summary:
This post is to show Markdown syntax rendering on TSdreamer, you can also use it as an example of writing. Now, let’s start looking at text and typography.

H2 - heading
H3 - heading
H4 - heading

entry.title: Stage Analysis
entry.summary:
Stock Stage Cycle Indicator
This indicator helps in the identification of the stage cycle of a stock. It should only be analyzed on Weekly and Daily timeframes.
Stages
Stage 1: Accumulation phase of a stock Stage 2: Uptrend phase Stage 3: Distribution phase Stage 4: Downtrend phase
Understanding the Stages
As shown in the chart, each stock goes through its stage cycle. Below poin...
